body.p: The Sámi Parliament’s plenum meets 4-5 times per year at the Sámi Cultural Centre Sajos in Inari. The meetings are open to public and can be observed in the Parliament hall or through live-stream broadcast . Interpreting equipment are also available for the public in the Parliament hall. The documents are available in Sámi languages and in Finnish here .

Meetings of Sámi Parliament’s expert committees are only public if the committee decides so. The Sámi Parliament’s executive board meets about once a month and committees as needed. The documents are available in Sámi languages and in Finnish here .
In addition the Sámi Parliament organizes and co-organizes various events, seminars and conferences. Here you’ll find the event calendar .
